channel.title: How to add shops to a 604
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've recently been experimenting with a 604 source (I think) I've just been trying it out, and i've never run a server other than a 317. I was looking at how to make custom shops. I'm used to making the shops, and linking it to the NPC using wanneshop, but in this source and i think all 604's theres no wanneshop in the client.java. I've looked around as best I can which probably wasn't good enough, and couldn't figure out where to go to link an NPC to a shop. If anyone knows how I know how to spawn the NPC, and create the shop just not link the NPC to the shop. If someone could tell me which file this is in I would be extremely grateful.
-Strafe

item.dc:creator: @Strafe Strafe
